official_title: Adapting a Mammography Decision Aid to Support Women Living in a Community Contaminated by Per- and Polyfluoroalkyl Substances (PFAS)
inclusion_criteria:
* Females aged 39-49
* No personal history of breast cancer,
* No mammogram in the prior 12 months
* Resident of Merrimack, Hillsborough, Rockingham or Bennington counties
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be FEMALE
Must have minimum age of 39 Years
Must have maximum age of 49 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* History of breast cancer, ductal carcinoma in situ, lobular carcinoma in situ
* Cognitive impairment impeding the ability to provide informed consent
